title: AudioPlayer tutorial
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to use your smartphone as an audio player.

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click _Open on this device_ to use the local device.

Moves the following components to the workspace

the **play** component

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/SpeechRecognition/text.png)

and the **stop** component

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/audioplayer/stop.png)
Go to youtube and get the short url of a video and paste it in the play component.

Press ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Timing/Timing.png) on the sidebar,

move the **delay** component
![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Timing/delay-component.png)

and put the components as in the image

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/audioplayer/image.png)
this is for you to see on the console what your smartphone is recognizing from what you are saying
